about_the_game:
Graphics Update Progress

Story
Endless Melody is an epic JRPG that follows a diverse group of characters as they navigate a dangerous and unpredictable world. As they struggle to uncover the truth about a devastating event that killed millions, they must also grapple with fundamental questions about their own identities.

At its heart, the game is a story about life, love, and acceptance in the face of overwhelming adversity. Set 15 years after the tragedy that decimated the land, the characters must confront their pasts and make difficult choices about the future.

The game also features beloved characters from the fan-favorite JRPG, "Gaia's Melody," including Akira, Zephyre, Doken, and Whyp. As they join the cast, they add new depth and complexity to the story.

So, to all those who would defend this world, let Gaia's final battle begin.[/i][/b]

Style
Endless Melody is a dynamic turn-based game that offers fast-paced, strategic combat. The game uses a unique Agi-based turn system that ensures battles move quickly and smoothly without the tediousness of active time battles.

Players can earn extra attacks per turn based on their level and weapons, and they can unlock new skills and abilities through a classic leveling system. Magic is accessed through the use of Crests, allowing players to customize their combat abilities.

In addition, the game introduces a new level of tactical depth by allowing players and enemies to move around the battlefield during combat. This adds a new level of strategy and realism to the game, making every encounter more exciting and engaging.

Overall, Endless Melody offers a fresh and exciting take on turn-based combat that will appeal to fans of the genre and newcomers alike.

Features
Endless Melody is an exciting and immersive JRPG that offers a range of dynamic features and gameplay mechanics. Some of the key highlights of the game include:

•A fast-paced and strategic battle system that allows players to engage in combat quickly and smoothly.
•Character Skits that offer in-depth character development and storytelling.
•An animal companion that players can train and evolve to become a powerful ally.
•Map-based monster encounters that allow players to choose when and where to engage in battles.
•In-game and Steam achievements that offer players new challenges and rewards to pursue.
•Several playable characters with unique abilities and personalities.
•A full-length JRPG experience that offers hours of gameplay and a rich, engaging story.

Overall, Endless Melody is a must-play for fans of the genre and anyone looking for a thrilling and engaging adventure.

▽ Meet the Characters ▽
Fighter is the hero of the story. He has a tragic past that robbed him of his memories, and he was taken in by the Brotherhood of Eternity, an ancient organization. He is a bit of a pervert, but he loves his younger sister, Amicia, and takes care of her when he is not training.

Amicia is Fighter's little sister. She is struggling to understand herself and her feelings in a world that is falling apart. She may not be the toughest girl, but she is resilient and will never give up on those she cares about.

Fate is a flying cat who befriends Fighter early on in the story. He is rude and crude, but he is loyal to Fighter and Amicia. Eventually, he will have to embrace his destiny and become the kitty he was meant to be.

Medley is a character who starts the story with a clear sense of who she is, but gradually becomes unsure of everything she thought she knew. She is determined and strong-willed, and she will eventually become the hero the world needs.

The story also features Erynn, a princess of Eeon; Amelia, Nisha, Sadie, and Kachie, the Light Warriors of Ivylan; and Agares, a returning villain. Together, these characters must face challenges and overcome obstacles to save the world from destruction.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I3 3220 (2012) or newer recommended
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9c / OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU/ 128MB or higher Integraged HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: Install to an SSD for faster load times
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5, Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated GPU 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
  • Additional Notes: Install to an SSD for faster load times

short_description: Fighter and his sister Amicia embark on a journey of self-discovery and face life-changing events as they search for answers to their biggest questions: "Where do we come from?" and "Where do we go from here?" Along the way, they learn about friendship, love, and themselves."
